apiUrl.title: conda-store server url
apiUrl.description: the url (including port, if any) for your conda-store server. The conda-store server needs to already be running for the jupyterlab extension to work

authMethod.title: conda-store auth method
authMethod.description: authentication method used for requests to your conda-store server

loginUrl.title: conda-store login url
loginUrl.description: if using cookie-based authentication, the path to the login page. See the conda-store auth method option

authToken.title: conda-store auth token
authToken.description: if using token-based authentication, the value of said token. See the conda-store auth method option
